author: arfrever
msg: If the configure script check for bindtextdomain() in libintl fails,
Fixes NLS support detection at least on OpenBSD, and maybe more systems.
I patched this bug ages ago for the OpenBSD Subversion package
but never committed a fix for it here (my bad).

author: arfrever
msg: Stop propagation of self-referential mergeinfo via --reintegrate merges.
In some use cases can lead to seriously broken merges as it appears
some merges have been performed which have not and others have not
which have.  Sorta defeats the purpose of merge tracking...
